articles.title: New bioinformatics tool spots hybrid fish that threaten the survival of natural tilapia populations in aquaculture - Science Daily

articles.description: Private healthcare provider says symptoms in country’s fourth wave are far milder than in previous waves

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: WHO: Omicron spreading in Africa but data suggests 'less severe' - New Straits Times
articles.description: BRAZZAVILLE: Cases of coronavirus in Africa nearly doubled over a week as Omicron spread, but hospitalisations in South Africa, where the new variant was discovered, remain low, the United Nations said Thursday.
